div.p: It is my pleasure to welcome you to the Valley Home Joint School District. The School District has been serving our community since 1903. During its long history, the school district has become well known for academic excellence and developing outstanding citizens.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-9ceadb9 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

span.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;

h5.span: Due to the concerns over the potential spread of the COVID-19, and in coordination with all the public schools in Stanislaus County, the Valley Home Joint School District will remain open only through Wednesday, March 18th.

p.b: We now have further guidance and directives from State Superintendent of Instruction Tony Thurmond and Governor Gavin Newsom to keep our school CLOSED through the end of the current school year.

span.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: medium;
span.b: The best way to communicate with the office staff now is via email, as the office will be open periodically – not every day. All staff emails are listed on the “STAFF” page. We will be checking our emails several times a day and will respond quickly.
